params.cToken: The address of the market (token) to delist

params.newBorrowCapGuardian: The address of the new Borrow Cap Guardian

_setCloseFactor(uint256).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).details: Admin function to set per-market collateralFactor

params.cToken: The market to set the factor on
params.newCollateralFactorMantissa: The new collateral factor, scaled by 1e18

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setLiquidationIncentive(uint256).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setLiquidityMining(address).details: Removing the liquidity mining module address could cause the inconsistency in the LM module.

params.newLiquidityMining: The address of the new liquidity mining module

_setMarketBorrowCaps(address[],uint256[].details: Admin or borrowCapGuardian function to set the borrow caps. A borrow cap of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing. If the total supplies     already exceeded the cap, it will prevent anyone to mint.

params.cTokens: The addresses of the markets (tokens) to change the borrow caps for
params.newBorrowCaps: The new borrow cap values in underlying to be set. A value of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

_setMarketSupplyCaps(address[],uint256[].details: Admin or supplyCapGuardian function to set the supply caps. A supply cap of 0 corresponds to unlimited supplying. If the total borrows     already exceeded the cap, it will prevent anyone to borrow.

params.cTokens: The addresses of the markets (tokens) to change the supply caps for
params.newSupplyCaps: The new supply cap values in underlying to be set. A value of 0 corresponds to unlimited supplying.

params.newPauseGuardian: The address of the new Pause Guardian

_setPauseGuardian(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See enum Error for details)

_setPriceOracle(address).details: Admin function to set a new price oracle
_setPriceOracle(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

params.newSupplyCapGuardian: The address of the new Supply Cap Guardian

_supportMarket(address,uint8).details: Admin function to set isListed and add support for the market

params.cToken: The address of the market (token) to list

_delistMarket(address).notice: Remove the market from the markets mapping

_setBorrowCapGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Borrow Cap Guardian

_setCloseFactor(uint256).notice: Sets the closeFactor used when liquidating borrows

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).notice: Sets the collateralFactor for a market

_setCreditLimit(address,address,uint256).notice: Sets protocol's credit limit by market

_setLiquidityMining(address).notice: Admin function to set the liquidity mining module address

_setMarketBorrowCaps(address[],uint256[].notice: Set the given borrow caps for the given cToken markets. Borrowing that brings total borrows to or above borrow cap will revert.

_setMarketSupplyCaps(address[],uint256[].notice: Set the given supply caps for the given cToken markets. Supplying that brings total supplys to or above supply cap will revert.

_setPauseGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Pause Guardian

_setPriceOracle(address).notice: Sets a new price oracle for the comptroller

_setSupplyCapGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Supply Cap Guardian

_supportMarket(address,uint8).notice: Add the market to the markets mapping and set it as listed

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to borrow the underlying asset of the given market

borrowVerify(address,address,uint256).notice: Validates borrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

checkMembership(address,address).notice: Returns whether the given account is entered in the given asset

enterMarkets(address[]).notice: Add assets to be included in account liquidity calculation

exitMarket(address).notice: Removes asset from sender's account liquidity calculation

flashloanAllowed(address,address,uint256.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market

getAccountLiquidity(address).notice: Determine the current account liquidity wrt collateral requirements

getAssetsIn(address).notice: Returns the assets an account has entered

getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,.notice: Determine what the account liquidity would be if the given amounts were redeemed/borrowed

isCreditAccount(address,address).notice: Check if the account is a credit account

isMarketListed(address).notice: Return a specific market is listed or not

liquidateBorrowAllowed(address,address,a.notice: Checks if the liquidation should be allowed to occur

liquidateBorrowVerify(address,address,ad.notice: Validates liquidateBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,ad.notice: Calculate number of tokens of collateral asset to seize given an underlying amount

mintAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to mint tokens in the given market

mintVerify(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Validates mint and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

redeemAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to redeem tokens in the given market

redeemVerify(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Validates redeem and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

repayBorrowAllowed(address,address,addre.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to repay a borrow in the given market

repayBorrowVerify(address,address,addres.notice: Validates repayBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

seizeAllowed(address,address,address,add.notice: Checks if the seizing of assets should be allowed to occur

seizeVerify(address,address,address,addr.notice: Validates seize and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

transferAllowed(address,address,address,.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market

transferVerify(address,address,address,u.notice: Validates transfer and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.
